description_html:
The Grand Raglan collection of sofas and lounge chairs is based on the Raglan family of modular
sofas and lounge chairs, but is distinguished by its more generous and physical volume. Grand
Raglan is the scene for a special moment. Its soft and elegant cushions extend generously in a
corporeal design but adjusted in dimensions while the upholstered elements seem to float on its
wooden base. Grand Raglan is a clear image of symmetry, and harmony of lines in a pure volume that
fills the space and generates distinctive compositions in the places they occupy.

Grand Raglan is a very cozy lounge collection. It consists of lounge chair and 2- and 3-seater sofas
with upholstered seat and back and base of steel base in chrome finish, white or black. Its design is
broad and corporeal, very generous internally.
Raglan offers premium comfort due to its seat and backrest with wide cushions thanks to an interior
developed from the combination of foams that offer comfort and quick recovery.
The harmonic style is the feature that brings lightness and innovation to Grand Raglan, it is the plinth
that subtly elevates the piece and distinguishes it, which gives a feeling of suspension and elevation
to its design.
